headline: A Green Beret and a Turkish Jet Company Aided in a Stunning Escape
abstract: More details about the former auto executive’s escape emerged. The Japanese news media said cameras showed him leaving his Tokyo home alone.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — Carlos Ghosn was aided in his escape from Japan by an American security consultant who accompanied him on the flight out of the country, a person familiar with the matter said, while a Turkish charter jet company said on Friday that its planes were used illegally to pull off the plan.
